primaryTopic.dcSource: Australian Ocean Data Network Organisation Register
primaryTopic.definition: The Department of National Parks, Sport and Racing key priorities are to: protect and manage our parks, forests and the Great Barrier Reef for current and future generations; Support and encourage active participation in physical activity; and Support the Queensland racing industry. This department is now split between the new Departments of Environment and Science, and Sport and Recreation.
